src:
OSOKOLJEN POBEDOM: Lukas Paketa odgovorio navijačima na kritike!
01 Nov 2019, 11:44 by Kopi
U zadnjoj utakmici 10. kola talijanske Serie A fudbaleri Milana su na San Siru u četvrtak uveče pobedili ekipu SPAL-a sa 1:0.
,,Rosoneri“ su ostvarili tek drugu pobedu u zadnjih sedam kola. Gol odluke postigao je Suso iz slobodnog udarca u 63. minutu, samo šest minuta nakon što je ušao u igru. Bio je to jedan od najlepših golova u Seriji A u ovoj sezoni.
Navijači Milana su Španca jako kritikovali proteklih meseci pa mu je ovaj gol došao kao veliko olakšanje i prvi je još od maja. U obranu Susa stao je i Lukas Paketa, vezista Milana koji se takođe muči sa pronalaskom prave forme.
– Pobeda je jako važna. Bio je to težak trenutak za sve nas, ali svi smo presrećni zbog Susa. Nije zaslužio status kakav ima u zadnje vrijeme. On je sjajan igrač i njegov gol će nam vratiti potrebno samopouzdanje – rekao je Brazilac za ,,Sky Sport Italia“.
Na Internetu se pojavilo kratak video snimak čelnika Milana Zvonimira Bobana i Paola Maldinija kako slave Špančev maestralni gol na tribinama kultnog San Sira.
I to je još jedan od pokazatelja da je uprava, baš kao i igrači, uz „zlostavljanog“ Susa.




POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
WINNED BY: Lukas Paketa responds to fans' criticism!
01 Nov 2019, 11:44 by Kopi
In the last game of the 10th round of the Italian Serie A, Milan footballers beat SPAL by 1-0 in San Siro on Thursday night.
The Rosoners earned only their second win in the last seven rounds. The goal was scored by Suso's free kick 63 minutes into the match, just six minutes into the match. It was one of the most beautiful goals in Serie A this season.
Milan fans have been heavily criticized by the Spaniards in recent months, so this goal came as a big relief and is the first since May. Lucas Packet, Milan's midfielder, also struggles to defend Susa, who is also struggling to find the right form.
- Winning is very important. It was a difficult moment for all of us, but we are all overjoyed with Sus. He did not deserve the status he has lately. He is a great player and his goal will give us the confidence we need, ”the Brazilian told Sky Sport Italia.
A short video appeared on the internet of Milan leaders Zvonimir Boban and Paolo Maldini celebrating the Spaniard's maestral goal in the stands of the cult San Siro.
And this is another indication that the administration, just like the players, is alongside the "abused" Sus.
